tool_description: Generates regulatory-compliant safety reports from adverse event data and safety monitoring information for submission requirements.

adverse_events_data.description: List of adverse event case identifiers or data references

report_type.description: Type of safety report (DSUR, PSUR, expedited_report, aggregate_report)

jurisdiction.description: Target regulatory jurisdiction for report format

include_narrative.description: Include narrative summaries for serious events

error_messages: Invalid adverse events data: Ensure all event identifiers are valid and accessible
Invalid report type: Use DSUR, PSUR, expedited_report, or aggregate_report
Invalid reporting period: End date must be after start date and within valid ranges
Invalid jurisdiction: Specify a recognized regulatory authority
Missing study identifier: Provide a valid protocol number
Data access error: Unable to access adverse event data for specified identifiers
usage: Specify adverse events data, report type, reporting period, and jurisdiction to generate compliant safety reports with appropriate formatting and analysis.

report_content.description: Generated safety report in regulatory format

serious_events_count.description: Number of serious adverse events in reporting period

regulatory_actions.description: Recommended regulatory actions based on safety data
